attributes.action: All NHS Workers to receive a different Taxing bracket smaller than current Tax
attributes.additional_details: This would encourage a higher amount of people to work in the NHS, which in return would relieve high stress on the NHS and a higher rate of employment. It would also boost the protection of the country from pandemics, and better prepare the country from dangerous situations.
attributes.background: Currently the NHS workers aren’t being paid enough, and also are being taxed so highly if earning above a certain annual income, barely enough to pay their own monthly responsibilities. Considering the field the NHS work in, the workers shouldn’t be paying as much tax as other workers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to how NHS staff are taxed, but it's not clear how you want tax for NHS staff to work.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give NHS workers a higher tax free income threshold: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578220

Stop deducting Tax and NI from our NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572153

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
